abstract: Berkshire Hathaway intends to webcast its annual shareholder meeting for first time; April stream on Yahoo Finance should attract thousands of viewers and boost ad revenue for flagging Internet company.

headline.print_headline: Berkshire Hathaway to Stream Annual Meeting on Yahoo
headline.main: Berkshire Hathaway to Stream Annual Meeting on Yahoo

snippet: Berkshire Hathaway said it would stream its annual meeting online this year, bringing the largest American shareholder gathering to a global audience.
lead_paragraph: Berkshire Hathaway said it would stream its annual meeting online this year, bringing the largest American shareholder gathering to a global audience.
